resources.string: Made to make Image recognition and your life easier.

This app has been made by Gourav to help people copy texts from images and posters easily. This app is provided free of cost and is intended to use as is. 

Be sure that, no data that you provide to this app, is ever stored anywhere. This app uses Google's ML kit to recognise texts, which runs locally, without internet. 

I hope this app will be beneficial to you :)
